channel.title: Packet bug (wrong map region) idk
channel.description:
Recently converted rs2-server 474 to a 525 revision I've mirrored another 525 source to get most of everything done, now the only problem I'm stuck with is this
[img]http://puu.sh/5utUP/7a93ee5b0a.png[/img]
Something wrong with the map region
the map region packet is correct I'm sure of that, what is causing this??

item.title: Packet bug (wrong map region) idk
item.dc:creator: @blackflag1 blackflag_
item.description:
@blackflag1 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:536154”][quote author=blackflag_ link=topic=654965.msg4386151#msg4386151 date=1385627215]

Besides your player model looking weird as fudge, I can’t see what’s wrong.

whats weird about it

and nvm, i managed to fix the issue

[/quote]
The head looks like dobby’s head from Harry Potter, for one.
The arm (left, facing the camera) is elongated and glitched (might be because of the area the player is on)
And need I mention the legs?[/quote]
i guess you never seen a low detailed 525 client

Read full topic
